Careers
We're always looking for new talent. Think you got what it takes?

ASP.NET MVC

Are you a technological person? Tikal offers you a career path that can give you leverage! With the right amount of challanges, cooperation and new technologies (such as MVC, TypeScript, AngularJS and much more). You will taste something better than any other conventional workplace.

Requirements

  • At least 4-5 years exeprience with .NET/C#, ASP.NET.

  • At least 1 year in ASP.NET MVC – A must.

  • In depth, JavaScript, CSS and HTML, AJAX knowledge.

  • Experience in MS SQL DB. Other DB's is a plus.

  • Experience with HTML5/CSS3 – A plus.
